meanings.definition: A rounded mass projecting above a surface.
meanings.sent1: The ants built tiny mounds in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The burial mounds in the field held ancient secrets.
meanings.sent3: The sandcastle mounds were so tall they reached the sky!
meanings.sent4: Her emotions formed mounds of joy in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The chocolate mounds on the cake looked delicious.

meanings.definition: A large pile or quantity of something.
meanings.sent1: The farmer harvested mounds of corn from the fields.
meanings.sent2: The treasure hunters found mounds of gold coins in the cave.
meanings.sent3: The laundry piled up in mounds on the bedroom floor.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness created mounds of gratitude in the community.
meanings.sent5: The library had mounds of books waiting to be read.
